languages.text: {n}Вы хотите задать вопрос, но простая вроде бы мысль ускользает. И вы задумываетесь уже о том, кто вершит судьбу человека в этом мире и действительно ли люди не властны над своей волей, потому что на все воля Неумирающего.{/n}

{n}You intend to ask a question, only to find that the seemingly simple idea you had in your mind has eluded you. Instead, you are now reflecting on who it is that decides the fate of a human in this world, and whether or not people are actually masters of their own free will, since everything is ruled by the will of the Undying Emperor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы хотите задать вопрос, но простая вроде бы мысль ускользает. И вы задумываетесь уже о том, кто вершит судьбу человека в этом мире и действительно ли люди не властны над своей волей, потому что на все воля Неумирающего.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You're meaning to ask a question, only to find that the seemingly simple idea you had in your mind has eluded you. Instead, you're now reflecting on who it is that decides the fate of a human in this world, and whether people really aren't masters of their own free will since everything is ruled by the will of the Undying One.{/n}

{n}You intend to ask a question, only to find that the seemingly simple idea you had in your mind has eluded you. Instead, you are now reflecting on who it is that decides the fate of a human in this world, and whether or not people are actually masters of their own free will, since everything is ruled by the will of the Undying Emperor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du willst etwas fragen, stellst jedoch fest, dass der scheinbar so simple Gedanke, den du eben noch hattest, plötzlich verschwunden ist. Stattdessen sinnst du jetzt darüber nach, wer über das Schicksal eines Menschen in dieser Welt entscheidet, und ob die Menschen wirklich Herr über ihren eigenen freien Willen sind oder nicht, schließlich wird alles vom Willen des Todlosen Imperators beherrscht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You intend to ask a question, only to find that the seemingly simple idea you had in your mind has eluded you. Instead, you are now reflecting on who it is that decides the fate of a human in this world, and whether or not people are actually masters of their own free will, since everything is ruled by the will of the Undying Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du willst etwas fragen, stellst jedoch fest, dass der scheinbar so simple Gedanke, den du eben noch hattest, plötzlich verschwunden ist. Stattdessen sinnst du jetzt darüber nach, wer über das Schicksal eines Menschen in dieser Welt entscheidet, und ob die Menschen wirklich Herr über ihren eigenen freien Willen sind oder nicht, schließlich wird alles vom Willen des Todlosen Imperators beherrscht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tienes intención de hacer una pregunta, pero la idea aparentemente sencilla que tenías en mente te elude. En lugar de ello, ahora meditas sobre quién decide el destino de una persona en este mundo y si la gente tiene alguna influencia real sobre su libre albedrío, pues la voluntad del Emperador Inmortal lo gobierna todo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You intend to ask a question, only to find that the seemingly simple idea you had in your mind has eluded you. Instead, you are now reflecting on who it is that decides the fate of a human in this world, and whether or not people are actually masters of their own free will, since everything is ruled by the will of the Undying Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tienes intención de hacer una pregunta, pero la idea aparentemente sencilla que tenías en mente te elude. En lugar de ello, ahora meditas sobre quién decide el destino de una persona en este mundo y si la gente tiene alguna influencia real sobre su libre albedrío, pues la voluntad del Emperador Inmortal lo gobierna todo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}質問するつもりが、自分の頭の中にあったはずの一見単純な考えが抜け落ちていることに気づく。その代わりに、あなたは今、この世界で人間の運命を決めるのは誰なのか、そして、人は果たして自分の自由意思の主なのかと考える。すべては不死の皇帝によって支配されているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You intend to ask a question, only to find that the seemingly simple idea you had in your mind has eluded you. Instead, you are now reflecting on who it is that decides the fate of a human in this world, and whether or not people are actually masters of their own free will, since everything is ruled by the will of the Undying Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}質問するつもりが、自分の頭の中にあったはずの一見単純な考えが抜け落ちていることに気づく。その代わりに、あなたは今、この世界で人間の運命を決めるのは誰なのか、そして、人は果たして自分の自由意思の主なのかと考える。すべては不死の皇帝によって支配されているのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你本打算问个问题，但却发现你脑海中原本简简单单的问题消失了。此时此刻，你正在思考究竟是谁决定了所有人在世间的命运。你在思考人类是否真的拥有自己的自由意志，因为毕竟一切都是按照不死神皇的旨意运转的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You intend to ask a question, only to find that the seemingly simple idea you had in your mind has eluded you. Instead, you are now reflecting on who it is that decides the fate of a human in this world, and whether or not people are actually masters of their own free will, since everything is ruled by the will of the Undying Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你本打算问个问题，但却发现你脑海中原本简简单单的问题消失了。此时此刻，你正在思考究竟是谁决定了所有人在世间的命运。你在思考人类是否真的拥有自己的自由意志，因为毕竟一切都是按照不死神皇的旨意运转的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous êtes sur le point de formuler une question quand vous vous apercevez subitement qu'elle vous est sortie de la tête, supplantée par ce questionnement existentiel : qui donc décide du sort des humains en ce monde, et les gens sont-ils vraiment maîtres de leur destin, quand tout ce qui doit advenir dépend entièrement de la volonté de l'Empereur Immortel ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You intend to ask a question, only to find that the seemingly simple idea you had in your mind has eluded you. Instead, you are now reflecting on who it is that decides the fate of a human in this world, and whether or not people are actually masters of their own free will, since everything is ruled by the will of the Undying Emperor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous êtes sur le point de formuler une question quand vous vous apercevez subitement qu'elle vous est sortie de la tête, supplantée par ce questionnement existentiel : qui donc décide du sort des humains en ce monde, et les gens sont-ils vraiment maîtres de leur destin, quand tout ce qui doit advenir dépend entièrement de la volonté de l'Empereur Immortel ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soru sormaya niyetlensen de zihninde basit gibi görünen fikrin uçup gittiğini fark ediyorsun. Onun yerine her şeye Ölmeyen İmparator'un arzusu hükmettiği için bu dünyada yaşayan bir insanın kaderine kimin karar verdiğine ve insanların gerçekten de özgür iradelerinde sözlerinin geçip geçmediğine kafa yormaya başlıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You intend to ask a question, only to find that the seemingly simple idea you had in your mind has eluded you. Instead, you are now reflecting on who it is that decides the fate of a human in this world, and whether or not people are actually masters of their own free will, since everything is ruled by the will of the Undying Emperor.{/n}
